form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_12_to_less_than_24_months_of_age__two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 12 – < 24 MONTHS OF AGE TWO

field.name: When giving complementary foods, consider the following:
Frequency: feed your child 5 times a day
Amount: increase amount gradually to ¾ cup, show amount in 250 mL cup or other cups mother/caregiver brings. Use a separate plate to make sure child eat all the food given
Thickness: give family foods cut into small pieces, finger foods, and sliced foods
Be patient and actively encourage your child to eat
Do not force your child to eat
Use a separate plate to feed child to make sure he or she eat all the food
